title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4060.1 - Two pounds limit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4060.1 - Two pounds limit

State Regulations

If a rider in a steeplechase or hurdle race is more
than two pounds short of such rider's proper or declared weight, such rider's
horse may be disqualified and the rider may be punished. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4060.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
